}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The USB ID for this device seems to be 2001:330d.
==Links of Interest== *[http://bernaerts.dyndns.org/linux/74-ubuntu/277-ubuntu-precise-dwa-131-rev-b1 Ubuntu 12.04 installation instructions] *[http://askubuntu.com/questions/443886/installing-d-link-dwa-131-13-10 ''Installing D-Link DWA-131 (13.10)'' on '''AskUbuntu'''] *[http://www.vuplus-community.net/board/threads/d-link-dwa-131-rev-b1-rtl8192cu.11642/ Thread on '''vuplus-community-net'''] *[http://www.dlink.com/uk/en/support/product/dwa-131-wireless-n-nano-usb-adapter?revision=deu_revb DLink linux driver]
